snippet: The United States conducted military exercises with neighboring Jordan and designated two leaders of Syrian jihadist groups as “global terrorists.”
abstract: United States is seeking to project a toughened posture against Syria, conducting military exercises with neighboring Jordan; designates two leaders of Syrian jihadist groups as 'global terrorists,' warning that they should be ostracized by other members of the Western-backed insurgency fighting Pres Bashar al-Assad.
lead_paragraph: The United States conducted military exercises with neighboring Jordan and designated two leaders of Syrian jihadist groups as “global terrorists.”

headline.main: U.S. Projects Tough Stance to Both Sides of Syria War
headline.print_headline: U.S. Projects Tough Stance to Both Sides of Syria War
